rows.label: tlk41200126_02_msg0001
rows.name: The people of Gula love the Torigonda!

rows.label: tlk41200126_02_msg0002
rows.name:
Mastering the Torigonda is important, but
I'm getting tired of hearing it lately...
I'm getting interested in other instruments.

rows.label: tlk41200126_02_msg0003
rows.name:
It'd be nice if Torigoth developed
and our culture mixed with others
to create a new instrument.

rows.label: tlk41200126_02_msg0004
rows.name:
I bet it would be a really
fun and interesting one.

rows.label: tlk41200126_02_msg0005
rows.name:
Well, of course, I'd want
it to be something you can
actually play properly.
